page.title: 02EAST PRESTON (continued).
page.content: which continued to be the main occupation on the rich soil of the coastal plain. The heritage of this traditional way of life is found in the garden centres,market gardens, nurseries and mushroom farms which supply London and local markets. Today it is a peaceful, quiet residential area where most of the houses have attractive gardens. It is a wonderful place for the old and young, with a wide range of facilities including shops, doctors ,dentists and a vet. Part of East Preston is now called Angmering On Sea. This is because until 1965 there used to be a workhouse in East Preston. The rich people didn't like this so they preferred to call the coastal area Angmering On Sea.
